children: ti ahaṃ pubbe bodhisambhārapūraṇakāle isisaṅghe paccekabuddhaisisamūhe tesaṃ samīpe himavantapabbate mātaṅgahatthikule vāraṇo caṇḍahatthī ahosinti sambandho. Manussādayo vāretīti
atha vā vācāya ravati koñcanādaṃ nadatīti
innerText: 1-2. Ekatiṃsatime vagge paṭhamāpadāne isisaṅghe ahaṃ pubbeti ahaṃ pubbe bodhisambhārapūraṇakāle isisaṅghe paccekabuddhaisisamūhe tesaṃ samīpe himavantapabbate mātaṅgahatthikule vāraṇo caṇḍahatthī ahosinti sambandho. Manussādayo vāretīti vāraṇo, atha vā vācāya ravati koñcanādaṃ nadatīti vāraṇo. Mahesīnaṃ pasādenāti paccekabuddhamahesīnaṃ pasādena. Paccekajinaseṭṭhesu, dhutarāgesu tādisūti lokadhammehi niccalesu paccekabuddhesu padmakesaraṃ padumareṇuṃ okiriṃ avasiñcinti sambandho.

children: ti vipassissa bhagavato catumaggañāṇādhārabhāvato ‘‘bodhī’’ti laddhanāmassa rukkhassa pūjā ahosīti attho.
ti assa bodhipūjāsamaye sannipatitassa mahājanassa sambuddho lokajeṭṭho narāsabho rukkhaṭṭho iva rukkhe ṭhito viya paññāyatīti attho.
nti mudusiliṭṭhamadhurauttamaghosaṃ udīrayaṃ kathayanto nicchārento catusaccaṃ pakāsesi, desesīti attho.
ti veneyyapuggalajjhāsayānurūpena desento saṃkhittena ca vitthārena ca desayīti attho.
chadanaṃ, doso chadanaṃ, moho chadanaṃ, sabbakilesā chadanā’’ti evaṃ vuttā chadanā vivaṭā ugghāṭitā viddhaṃsitā anenāti vivaṭṭacchado, sambuddho. Taṃ mahājanaṃ desanāvasena
ti tassa bhagavato desentassa dhammaṃ sutvā.
innerText: 13-16. Catutthāpadāne mahābodhimaho ahūti vipassissa bhagavato catumaggañāṇādhārabhāvato ‘‘bodhī’’ti laddhanāmassa rukkhassa pūjā ahosīti attho. Rukkhaṭṭhasseva sambuddhoti assa bodhipūjāsamaye sannipatitassa mahājanassa sambuddho lokajeṭṭho narāsabho rukkhaṭṭho iva rukkhe ṭhito viya paññāyatīti attho. Bhagavā tamhi samayeti tasmiṃ bodhipūjākaraṇakāle bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghapurakkhato bhikkhusaṅghena parivuto. Vācāsabhimudīrayanti mudusiliṭṭhamadhurauttamaghosaṃ udīrayaṃ kathayanto nicchārento catusaccaṃ pakāsesi, desesīti attho. Saṃkhittenaca desentoti veneyyapuggalajjhāsayānurūpena desento saṃkhittena ca vitthārena ca desayīti attho. Vivaṭṭacchadoti rāgo chadanaṃ, doso chadanaṃ, moho chadanaṃ, sabbakilesā chadanā’’ti evaṃ vuttā chadanā vivaṭā ugghāṭitā viddhaṃsitā anenāti vivaṭṭacchado, sambuddho. Taṃ mahājanaṃ desanāvasena nibbāpesi pariḷāhaṃ vūpasamesīti attho. Tassāhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvānāti tassa bhagavato desentassa dhammaṃ sutvā.

children: ti vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā madhurāni phalāni gahetvā apekkhavā aturito saṇikaṃ assamaṃ gañchinti attho.
innerText: 20. Pañcamāpadāne phalahattho apekkhavāti vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā madhurāni phalāni gahetvā apekkhavā aturito saṇikaṃ assamaṃ gañchinti attho.

children: ti sīmāya navakamme niṭṭhaṃ gate sati.
nti anupacchā sudhālepaṃ adāsiṃ, sudhāya lepāpesinti attho.
innerText: 40. Aṭṭhamāpadāne niṭṭhite navakamme cāti sīmāya navakamme niṭṭhaṃ gate sati. Anulepamadāsahanti anupacchā sudhālepaṃ adāsiṃ, sudhāya lepāpesinti attho.
